021import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.YamlDocument;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
024import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
025import net.tnemc.core.currency.CurrencyRegion;
026import net.tnemc.core.currency.CurrencySaver;
027import net.tnemc.core.currency.Denomination;
028import net.tnemc.core.currency.Note;
029import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemCurrency;
030import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemDenomination;
031import net.tnemc.core.utils.MISCUtils;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
034
035import java.io.File;
036import java.io.IOException;
037import java.util.Map;
038import java.util.Optional;
039
040/**
041 * DefaultCurrencySaver
042 *
043 * @author creatorfromhell
044 * @since 0.1.2.0
045 */
046public class DefaultCurrencySaver implements CurrencySaver {
047
048  /**
049   * Saves all currencies.
050   *
051   * @param directory The directory used for saving.
052   */
053  @Override
054  public void saveCurrencies(final File directory) {
055
056    for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().currencies()) {
057      saveCurrency(new File(directory, currency.getFile()), currency);
058    }
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Saves all currency UUIDs only.
063   *
064   * @param directory The directory used for saving.
065   */
066  @Override
067  public void saveCurrenciesUUID(final File directory) {
068
069    PluginCore.log().debug("Saving currencies uuid...");
070
071    for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().currencies()) {
072      saveID(directory, currency);
073    }
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Saves a specific currency
078   *
079   * @param directory The directory used for saving.
080   * @param currency  The currency to save.
081   */
082  @Override
083  public void saveCurrency(final File directory, final Currency currency) {
084
085    YamlDocument cur = null;
086
087    try {
088
089      cur = YamlDocument.create(directory);
090
091    } catch(final IOException e) {
092      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
093      return;
094    }
095
096    PluginCore.log().inform("Saving Currency: " + currency.getIdentifier());
097
098    //Currency Info configs.
099    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Server", "The server this currency belongs to, for data saving purposes.");
100    cur.set("Info.Server", MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Name"));
101
102    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Identifier", "The identifier of this currency used for various commands.");
103    cur.set("Info.Identifier", currency.getIdentifier());
104
105    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.UUIDAsId", "Whether to use the Identifier config as the currency's UUID. Not Recommended. Can lead to issues in the future");
106    cur.set("Info.UUIDAsId", false);
107
108    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Icon", "The material name to use as the icon for this currency in the plugin menus.");
109    cur.set("Info.Icon", currency.getIconMaterial());
110
111    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Major_Single", "The singular form of this currency's major denomination.");
112    cur.set("Info.Major_Single", currency.getDisplay());
113
114    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Major_Plural", "The plural form of this currency's major denomination.");
115    cur.set("Info.Major_Plural", currency.getDisplayPlural());
116
117    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Minor_Single", "The singular form of this currency's minor denomination.");
118    cur.set("Info.Minor_Single", currency.getDisplayMinor());
119
120    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Minor_Plural", "The plural form of this currency's minor denomination.");
121    cur.set("Info.Minor_Plural", currency.getDisplayMinorPlural());
122
123    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.Symbol", "The character to use as the symbol for this currency.");
124    cur.set("Info.Symbol", currency.getSymbol());
125
126    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.UUID", "Used for data saving. Do NOT modify.");
127    cur.set("Info.UUID", currency.getUid().toString());
128
129    //World Configurations
130    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MultiRegion", "Configurations relating to multi region support.");
131    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MultiRegion.Regions", "Configurations relating to regions this currency is enabled in.");
132    for(final CurrencyRegion region : currency.getRegions().values()) {
133
134      if(region.region().equalsIgnoreCase("global")) {
135
136        MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Global", "Configurations relating to global configurations for this currency.");
137        MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Global.Enabled", "Should this currency be global?(i.e. usable in every world)");
138        cur.set("Options.Global.Enabled", region.isEnabled());
139
140        MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Global.Default", "Should this currency be the global default?");
141        cur.set("Options.Global.Default", region.isDefault());
142        continue;
143      }
144      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MultiRegion.Regions." + region.region() + ".Enabled", "Should this currency be enabled in this world?");
145      cur.set("Options.MultiRegion.Regions." + region.region() + ".Enabled", region.isEnabled());
146
147      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MultiRegion.Regions." + region.region() + ".Default", "Should this currency be the default in this world?");
148      cur.set("Options.MultiRegion.Regions." + region.region() + ".Default", region.isDefault());
149    }
150
151    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Disabled", "Whether this currency is enabled.");
152    cur.set("Options.Disabled", false);
153
154    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Sync", "Should this currency be synced across servers when enabled?");
155    cur.set("Options.Sync", true);
156
157    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MaxBalance", "The maximum balance possible for this currency.");
158    cur.set("Options.MaxBalance", currency.getMaxBalance().toPlainString());
159
160    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.MinBalance", "The minimum balance possible for this currency.");
161    cur.set("Options.MinBalance", currency.getMinBalance().toPlainString());
162
163    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Balance", "The initial balance for accounts.");
164    cur.set("Options.Balance", currency.getStartingHoldings().toPlainString());
165
166    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Decimal", "The character to use as the decimal placeholder.");
167    cur.set("Options.Decimal", currency.getDecimal());
168
169    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.DecimalPlaces", "The amount of digits to display after the decimal character.(Max 4)");
170    cur.set("Options.DecimalPlaces", currency.getDecimalPlaces());
171
172    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Type", "The currency type to use for this currency. Valid Types: virtual, item, experience, mixed");
173    cur.set("Options.Type", currency.getType());
174
175    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Options.Minor_Weight", "This is used to determine how many of minor it takes to make one major");
176    cur.set("Options.Minor_Weight", currency.getMinorWeight());
177
178    //Load our item-back currency configurations.
179    if(currency instanceof final ItemCurrency item) {
180
181      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Item", "All configurations relating to item-backed currencies");
182      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Item.EnderChest", "Would you like your item currency balances to also check the player's ender chest?");
183      cur.set("Item.EnderChest", item.canEnderChest());
184
185      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Item.EnderFill", "Would you like your item currency items to go into the ender chest before dropping on the ground if inventory is full?");
186      cur.set("Item.EnderFill", item.isEnderFill());
187
188      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Item.ImportItems", "Whether to import exist item currencies into a player's balance with the first balance check for this currency.");
189      cur.set("Item.ImportItems", item.isImportItem());
190
191      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Item.BlockCrafting", "Whether we should block crafting with this currency");
192      cur.set("Item.BlockCrafting", item.blockCraft());
193
194      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Item.Shulker", "Should items from shulkers be used in holdings calculations");
195      cur.set("Item.Shulker", item.shulker());
196
197      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Item.Bundle", "Should items from bundles be used in holdings calculations");
198      cur.set("Item.Bundle", item.bundle());
199    }
200
201    //Formatting Configurations
202    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting", "All configurations related to formatting.");
203    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting.Format", "The format to use when outputting this currency into chat.");
204    cur.set("Formatting.Format", currency.getFormat());
205
206    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting.Prefixes", "The SI Prefixes used when <shorten> is used for the currency's format.");
207    cur.set("Formatting.Prefixes", currency.getPrefixes());
208
209    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting.Major_Separate", "Whether the major value should be separated every three numeric places.");
210    cur.set("Formatting.Major_Separate", currency.isSeparateMajor());
211
212    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting.Major_Separator", "The separator to use for numeric separation.");
213    cur.set("Formatting.Major_Separator", currency.getMajorSeparator());
214
215    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Formatting.Balance", "Should this currency be shown in the balance commands.");
216    cur.set("Formatting.Balance", currency.isBalanceShow());
217
218    //Load our note configurations.
219    final Optional<Note> note = currency.getNote();
220
221    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note", "All configurations relating to currency notes.");
222    MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Notable", "Whether this currency is able to be noted using the note command");
223    cur.set("Note.Notable", note.isPresent());
224    if(note.isPresent()) {
225
226      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Fee", "The fee to note this currency.");
227      cur.set("Note.Fee", note.get().getFee().asString());
228
229      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Minimum", "The minimum amount required to create a note for this currency.");
230      cur.set("Note.Minimum", note.get().getMinimum().toPlainString());
231
232      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item", "Configurations relating to the note item.");
233      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item.Material", "The material to use.");
234      cur.set("Note.Item.Material", note.get().getMaterial());
235
236      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item.ModelData", "The custom model data value used for this item. Defaults to 0. Optional");
237      cur.set("Note.Item.ModelData", note.get().getCustomModelData());
238
239      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item.Texture", "The base64 texture to use if the material is PLAYER_HEAD");
240      cur.set("Note.Item.Texture", note.get().getTexture());
241
242      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item.Item.Enchantments", "All configurations relating to enchantment identification for the note item");
243      cur.set("Note.Item.Item.Enchantments", note.get().getEnchantments());
244
245      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Note.Item.Item.Flags", "All configurations relating to item flags identification for the note item");
246      cur.set("Note.Item.Item.Flags", note.get().getFlags());
247    }
248
249    //Conversion
250    if(!currency.getConversion().isEmpty()) {
251      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Converting", "Format is currency name and decimal based rate");
252
253      for(final Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : currency.getConversion().entrySet()) {
254        cur.set("Converting." + entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
255      }
256    }
257
258    try {
259      cur.save();
260    } catch(final IOException e) {
261      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
262    }
263
264    final File curDirectory = new File(directory.getParentFile(), currency.getIdentifier());
265    if(!curDirectory.exists()) {
266      try {
267
268        if(!curDirectory.mkdirs()) {
269
270          PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), DebugLevel.STANDARD);
271          return;
272        }
273      } catch(final Exception e) {
274
275        PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
276        return;
277      }
278    }
279
280    for(final Denomination denomination : currency.getDenominations().values()) {
281      saveDenomination(curDirectory, currency, denomination);
282    }
283  }
284
285  public void saveID(final File directory, final Currency currency) {
286
287    YamlDocument cur = null;
288
289    try {
290
291      cur = YamlDocument.create(new File(directory, currency.getFile()));
292
293    } catch(final IOException e) {
294      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
295      return;
296    }
297
298    if(!cur.contains("Info.UUID")) {
299      MISCUtils.setComment(cur, "Info.UUID", "Used for data saving. Do NOT modify.");
300    }
301
302    cur.set("Info.UUID", currency.getUid().toString());
303
304    try {
305      cur.save();
306    } catch(final IOException e) {
307      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency: " + currency.getIdentifier(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
308    }
309  }
310
311  /**
312   * Saves a specific currency denomination
313   *
314   * @param directory    The directory used for saving.
315   * @param currency     The currency of the denomination.
316   * @param denomination The denomination to save.
317   */
318  @Override
319  public void saveDenomination(final File directory, final Currency currency, final Denomination denomination) {
320
321    YamlDocument denom = null;
322    try {
323
324      denom = YamlDocument.create(new File(directory, denomination.singular() + ".yml"));
325    } catch(final IOException e) {
326      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency denomination: " + denomination.singular(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
327      return;
328    }
329
330    PluginCore.log().inform("Attempting to save currency denomination: " + denomination.singular());
331
332    MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Info", "Configurations relating to basic information about this currency tier.");
333
334    MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Info.Single", "The singular name of this tier.");
335    denom.set("Info.Single", denomination.singular());
336
337    MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Info.Plural", "The plural name of this tier.");
338    denom.set("Info.Plural", denomination.plural());
339
340    MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options", "Various options for this currency tier.");
341
342    MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Weight", "The weight of the tier. E.X. 20USD would equal 20");
343    denom.set("Options.Weight", denomination.weight().doubleValue());
344
345    if(denomination instanceof final ItemDenomination itemDenomination) {
346
347      MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Material", "The material used for this item.");
348      denom.set("Options.Material", itemDenomination.material());
349
350      if(itemDenomination.getTexture() != null) {
351        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Texture", "The base64 texture to use if the material is PLAYER_HEAD");
352        denom.set("Options.Texture", itemDenomination.getTexture());
353      }
354
355      if(itemDenomination.getDamage() > 0) {
356        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Damage", "The damage value used for this item. Defaults to 0.(Optional)");
357        denom.set("Options.Damage", itemDenomination.getDamage());
358      }
359
360      if(itemDenomination.getName() != null) {
361        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Name", "The custom name this item must have in order to be considered currency.(Optional)");
362        denom.set("Options.Name", itemDenomination.getName());
363      }
364
365      if(!itemDenomination.getLore().isEmpty()) {
366        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Lore", "The lore string this item must have  in order to be considered currency.(Optional)");
367        denom.set("Options.Lore", itemDenomination.getLoreAsString());
368      }
369
370      if(itemDenomination.getCustomModel() > -1) {
371        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.ModelData", "The custom model data value used for this item. Defaults to 0.(Optional)");
372        denom.set("Options.ModelData", itemDenomination.getCustomModel());
373      }
374
375      if(!itemDenomination.enchantments().isEmpty()) {
376        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Enchantments", "All configurations relating to enchantment identification for currency tiers.(Optional)");
377        denom.set("Options.Enchantments", itemDenomination.enchantments());
378      }
379
380      if(!itemDenomination.flags().isEmpty()) {
381        MISCUtils.setComment(denom, "Options.Flags", "All configurations relating to item flags identification for currency tiers.(Optional)");
382        denom.set("Options.Flags", itemDenomination.flags());
383      }
384
385      //TODO: Crafting stuff
386    }
387
388    try {
389      denom.save();
390    } catch(final IOException e) {
391      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save currency denomination: " + denomination.singular(), e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
392    }
393  }
394}
